text:
It seems like the main bath area got renovated. Come to
think of it, we got discount coupons earlier, was it for this?

...Yes, indeed.
Sweating it out seems good for the skin, doesn't it?

I'm curious too...
It must be good for recovery from fatigue, right?
Then, how about going after today's training is over!

Actually, I got discount coupons too!
And two of them!
